title: Nepal to export 1,000 MW electricity to India: EAM Jaishankar
description: Nepal will export around 1,000 megawatts of electricity to India, marking a 'new milestone' as declared by Indian External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar. The decision followed talks with Nepalese Minister Arzu Rana Deuba. The meeting emphasized energy, trade, and infrastructure collaboration. Deuba believes the visit will reinforce the enduring relationship between the two neighboring countries.
